definition[0]: relating to the sides of something, or movement to the side
example[0]: The wall is weak and requires lateral support.
definition[1]: relating to positions, jobs, relationships etc that are at the same level or rank
example[1]: Employees can expect lateral moves to different departments, to gain experience.
definition[2]: relating to the same level in an organization
example[2]: At best, the typical employee can expect a few promotions and a number of lateral moves.
